price: 22. Kaši awumelaki tango molayi te na kozonga, mpe alobaki na mokonzi ete: Nazui boyebi oyo ozali na yango te, mpe nayeli yo sango ya sôló, kowuta na mboka sabat(2).
arabic: فَمَكَثَ غَيۡرَ بَعِيدٖ فَقَالَ أَحَطتُ بِمَا لَمۡ تُحِطۡ بِهِۦ وَجِئۡتُكَ مِن سَبَإِۭ بِنَبَإٖ يَقِينٍ
footnotes: 2  Sabat: Ezali mboka moko na yemen.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: famakatha ghayra baʿīdin faqāla aḥaṭtu bimā lam tuḥiṭ bihi waji'tuka min saba-in binaba-in yaqīnin
translations: and I have come to you
